name: Extreme Bicycle City Race
description:
Extreme Bicycle City Race is sports cycle racing game, which testing the cycling skills. In this racing simulator and quad moto stunts you will be riding your mountain cycle on city roads against other players in the game. Win all the levels as a professional cycle racer in this racing game and show the world you are master in cycling race.
Features:
-True real-time cycle racing at your fingertips
-Real action & thrill on detailed race tracks
-Smooth and realistic turbo racing game
-Different sports bicycles
-Awesome 3D Graphics And 3D Sound Effects
